reviews.review_msg: This is one of the most useful courses in the SIS certificate! I am glad I took it, got a good grade in the end! The content is good and the prof and ta explained well. The practical and hands-on parts were really enjoyable. I interviewed for a job and got it based on my skills from this course. Thanks Suzana and Taylor!!

Learned valuable skills that got me a job!  If you are willing to work you do well. Was in a group with quite a few slackers who were looking to pass the work on to me. I did the work, got the skills and then a job while my group members are still complaining!! Goes to show, do the work and you will come out well. All round good course.

Absolute nightmare of a course. TA was helpful at working on our models and was the only reason I came out of this course alive. Prerequisite were entirely useless. Expectations were that if you had never used Idrisi before you would be okay, however, the learning curve was so steep that I drowned. If you haven't worked with Idrisi stay far faraway
The course was very well organized and delivered. The Prof is good at explaining difficult concepts. I enjoyed this course.
Unfairness of grading. If you have more techniques on Flash and Idrisi, you get advantage.  She is hard marker on projects and she won't fail you.

Great course. Learnt a lot about spatial analysis and modeling from this course. Apart from content, she taught us lots of research skills rather than loosing us in the labs like other Geog courses. Highly organized Prof.
